query: How do I check my data balance
response: Open the telecom app and go to My Account. View your remaining data, calls, and SMS. See your plan expiry date

query: How to recharge my plan
response: Open the app and tap Recharge. Select your desired plan or amount. Choose payment method. Complete the transaction. Confirmation SMS will be sent

query: How do I change my plan
response: Open the app and go to Plans. View available plans. Click Change Plan. Select your new plan. Pay any difference. New plan activates immediately

query: My internet is very slow
response: Restart your phone. Toggle airplane mode off then on. Check if 4G is enabled. Move closer to network tower. Use mobile data instead of WiFi. Check if data limit reached

query: My phone is not connecting to mobile network
response: Check if airplane mode is OFF. Reinsert your SIM card. Restart your phone. Check network settings. Search for networks manually. If still not working, visit service center

query: Battery is draining very fast
response: Reduce screen brightness. Disable background app refresh. Turn off mobile data when not needed. Check battery usage in settings. Enable battery saver mode. Update device software

query: I am unable to make calls
response: Check if you have account balance. Verify airplane mode is OFF. Ensure phone number format is correct. Restart your phone. Check network signal. Try switching between 4G and 3G. Contact support

query: What is the best plan for heavy data users
response: Consider Unlimited Data Plans with no throttling. Family Plans to share data. Work Plans with high-speed data. Choose based on daily usage and required speed

query: How do I know if 5G is available in my area
response: Open the app and go to Coverage. Enter your location or pincode. Check if 5G is marked available. Enable 5G in phone settings. Look for 5G icon in status bar

query: My SIM card is not detected
response: Power off your phone. Carefully remove SIM card. Clean both sides with soft cloth. Reinsert SIM card firmly. Power on phone. Wait 30 seconds. If still not detected, visit service center

query: How do I report a billing issue
response: Open the app and go to Billing. Find disputed charge. Click Raise Dispute. Select reason and provide details. Team will review within 48 hours. Receive updates via SMS and email

query: What are the roaming charges
response: Domestic roaming is usually included. International roaming varies by country. Open app and search for Roaming Charges. Select destination country. View rates. Consider roaming packs for discounts

query: How do I top up my balance
response: Open the telecom app and tap Top Up. Enter amount or select preset. Choose payment method. Complete payment. Balance updates instantly. Get confirmation SMS

query: My WiFi calling is not working
response: Go to Settings and Mobile Networks. Find WiFi Calling. Toggle it ON. Select WiFi Preferred or Mobile Preferred. Ensure WiFi is stable. Check if WiFi calling is supported in region

query: How do I check my call history and usage
response: Open the app and go to Usage. View Calls, SMS, and Data used. See day-wise usage. Set data alerts. Export usage report as PDF if needed

query: I am getting unwanted calls
response: Tap Reject on incoming call. Select Block this number. Go to Settings and Call Settings. Manage Block List. Enable Call Screening for spam. Report spam through app. Enable Do Not Disturb at night

query: What is my current plan details
response: Open the app and go to My Plan. See plan name, cost, validity, data limit, and benefits. View bill due date. Option to upgrade or change plan

query: My payment was rejected
response: Check if sufficient balance in account. Ensure card or UPI is active. Try different payment method. Check internet connection. Wait 5 minutes and retry. Contact your bank if card issue

query: How do I enable mobile hotspot
response: Go to Settings and Tethering. Toggle Mobile Hotspot ON. Set WiFi name and password. Share with others. Note hotspot uses more battery. Can limit connected devices

query: I am not receiving SMS or OTP
response: Check if SMS enabled in settings. Verify data or signal available. Check inbox and spam. Restart phone. Remove SMS filter apps. Request resend. Try switching networks. Contact support

query: How to upgrade my plan
response: Open app and navigate to Plans. Select plan with more data. Click Upgrade. Select upgrade date. Pay pro-rata amount if any. Confirm. Receive confirmation SMS

query: How to downgrade my plan
response: Go to Plans in app. Select plan with lower data. Click Downgrade. Choose effective date usually next billing cycle. Confirm change. Receive confirmation SMS

query: What is FUP speed
response: After using all high-speed data, speed reduces to FUP speed usually 64 kbps. Can still use internet at reduced speed at no cost. Applies until next billing cycle. Upgrade for unlimited speed

query: How do I add a data add-on
response: Open app and go to Data Add-ons. Choose package size and validity. Select add-ons like 1GB, 2GB, 5GB. Click Add Now. Complete payment. Data added instantly to account

query: How to enable do not disturb mode
response: Go to Settings and Sounds. Find Do Not Disturb. Toggle ON. Set schedule like 10 PM to 8 AM. Choose which contacts can reach you. Exceptions for Favorites. Emergency calls always come through

query: How do I view my bill
response: Open app and go to Billing. Select billing month. See itemized charges including plan, add-ons, taxes. Download bill as PDF. Check due date. Pay online through app

query: What payment methods are accepted
response: Debit Cards, Credit Cards, UPI, Mobile Wallets, Net Banking. EMI options for some transactions. All payments secure with SSL encryption

query: How long does activation take
response: Plan Change is instant or within 24 hours. Recharge within 5 to 10 minutes. New Connection takes 24 to 48 hours. Add-ons instant. Receive confirmation SMS. Check My Account for status

query: Can I pause my plan
response: Open app and go to My Plan. Look for Pause Plan option. Select pause duration like 7, 15, or 30 days. Charges pause during period. Number remains reserved. Auto-resume after pause. Can resume manually

query: How to get international roaming
response: Open app and go to Roaming. Select destination country. Choose roaming pack. View country rates. Activate roaming. Receive welcome SMS in country. Set data limits to avoid surprises

query: My number is not showing
response: Check if airplane mode is OFF. Reinsert SIM card. Go to Settings and About Phone. Check Status. If blank, contact support. Support can verify and update. Shows after network registration

query: How to register a complaint
response: Open app and go to Help. Click Register Complaint. Select category. Describe issue in detail. Attach documents or screenshots. Submit complaint. Get ticket number for tracking. Resolution within 24 to 48 hours

query: What is the customer care number
response: Toll-Free Number usually 191 or 100. Check app for exact number. Chat Support available 24 by 7. Email Support available. Social Media Twitter and Facebook. Whatsapp Support available

query: How to block incoming calls
response: Tap Reject on unwanted call. Select Block Number. Blocked number will not ring. Go to Settings and Call Settings. Find Blocked List. Tap Unblock to remove. Can block up to 100 numbers

query: How to enable location services
response: Go to Settings and Location. Toggle Location Services ON. Choose High Accuracy or Battery Saving. Allow app permissions. GPS will work for maps. Note GPS uses more battery. Turn off when not needed

query: How to clear cache and improve performance
response: Go to Settings and Storage. Find app using memory. Tap Clear Cache. Does not delete your data. For deep clean go to Optimize. Uninstall unused apps. Restart phone after clearing

query: What is USSD code
response: USSD codes are shortcuts to access services without internet. Work on 2G, 3G, 4G networks. Common codes include 123 for balance, 191 for care, 567 for plan. Check documentation for all codes

query: How to update app
response: Open Play Store or App Store. Search for telecom app. If update available, tap Update. Wait for download and install. Tap Open. Force stop old app if needed. Updates include features and fixes

query: How to change my password
response: Open app and go to Settings. Select Security. Click Change Password. Enter current password. Enter new strong password with 8 characters. Confirm new password. Password changes instantly

query: Can I use my plan abroad
response: Yes with International Roaming. Add roaming pack before travel. Check rates for destination. Set data limit to control costs. Turn off auto-sync. Use WiFi when available. Keep emergency contacts accessible
